thread.title: Lena Dunham Is Glad That Glamour Magazine Left Her Cellulite On The Cover
thread.title_full: Lena Dunham Is Glad That Glamour Magazine Left Her Cellulite On The Cover

author: Gyan Yankovich
title: Lena Dunham Is Glad That Glamour Magazine Left Her Cellulite On The Cover
text:
View this image ›
Condé Nast As you can see, they all look damn good.
ID: 10261002 2. In an Instagram post, Dunham thanked the magazine for leaving her thigh on “full imperfect display” and “letting my cellulite do the damn thing”. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @lenadunham In the photo caption she described the bullying she faced in high school, before explaining that it was nothing compared to the legions of trolls she’s faced since beginning her career.
“ Whether you agree with my politics, like my show or connect to what I do, it doesn’t matter - my body isn’t fair game. No one’s is, no matter their size, color, gender identity, and there’s a place for us all in popular culture to be recognized as beautiful,” she wrote.
ID: 10261008 3. “Thank you to the women in Hollywood (and on Instagram!) leading the way, inspiring and normalizing the female form in EVERY form,” she ended the post. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @lenadunham
ID: 10261115
 More News About Lena Dunham, Jemima Kirke Gyan Yankovich is a Lifestyle Editor for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
